title: SHED
text: A base set up for GitHub Common Integration (CI) Quarto and python script environment.

title: Open Data for public-transport visualisation
text: A set of open data and other resources that could be used to produce transport and related visualisations.

title: Open Data for public-transport visualisation
text:
Base Geography
The base geography and population data is based on:

The base map of mainland Britain is derived from the WorldPop base maps under CC 4.0 by deed retrieved 2023-09-07.
OpenStreetMap data is then used to validate and also to identify 10 stations locations which is licensed under CC-BY-SA 2.0 through the OverPassAPI Turbo service.

title: Open Data for public-transport visualisation
text:
Base Rail data
These base data consist of the centre-line or network track-model, Network Rail location codes, plus the CIF format timetable and VSTP updates.



Product
Note
Owner
Licence




Track Model
Railway network model Shapefile with link, node, reference lines and waymark layers. See Open Data Technical Specification.
Network Rail
Open (OGL3)


CORPUS
Lookup codes for rail stations from the CORPUS system (Codes for Operations, Retail & Planning – a Unified Solution). See OpenRailData wiki
Network Rail
Open (OGL3)


Schedule
Daily train schedule extract and updates from the national Integrated Train Planning System in Common InterFace (CIF) format. See OpenRailData wiki
Network Rail
Open (OGL3)


Very Short-Term Planning (VSTP)
Real-time train schedules created via the Very Short Term Plan (VSTP) process. See OpenRailData wiki
Network Rail
Open (OGL3)

title: Open Data for public-transport visualisation
section: Key Station and Public Transport Data
text:
Key Station and Public Transport Data
These data are the National Passenger Transport Access Node (NaPTAN) and Transport Gazette for Great Britain.



Product
Note
Owner
Licence




NaPTAN & NPTG
This CSV and XML API contains information for all passenger transport nodes including rail, bus-stops, ferry terminals and airports. PDF user guide
Department for Transport (DfT)
Open (OGL3)


Station attributes for all mainline stations in GB
Table 6329: Station attributes for all mainline stations, Great Britain as ODS file.
Office of Road and Rail (ORR)
Open (OGL3)


Stations Reference Data
Geographic station names output from journey planning in XML format file.
Rail Development Group (RDG)
Open


Knowledgebase Stations data feed
A station data-feed which includes information on train stations in XML format API.
Rail Development Group (RDG)
Open

title: Open Data for public-transport visualisation
section: Office of Road and Rail Orign and Destination (ODM) data
text:
Office of Road and Rail Orign and Destination (ODM) data
These are the base Origin and Destination Matrix (ODM) data showing journeys between all pairs of mainline stations in Great Britain used in ODM visualisations.



Product
Note
Owner
Licence




Origin Destination Matrix 2018-19
Origin and destination matrix (ODM) financial year 2018-19
Office of Road and Rail (ORR)
Open (OGL3)


Origin Destination Matrix 2019-20
Origin and destination matrix (ODM) financial year 2019-20
Office of Road and Rail (ORR)
Open (OGL3)


Origin Destination Matrix 2020-21
Origin and destination matrix (ODM) financial year 2020-21
Office of Road and Rail (ORR)
Open (OGL3)


Origin Destination Matrix 2021-22
Origin and destination matrix (ODM) financial year 2021-22
Office of Road and Rail (ORR)
Open (OGL3)


Origin Destination Matrix 2022-23
Origin and destination matrix (ODM) financial year 2022-23
Office of Road and Rail (ORR)
Open (OGL3)


Origin Destination Matrix 2023-24
Origin and destination matrix (ODM) financial year 2023-24
Office of Road and Rail (ORR)
Open (OGL3)

title: Open Data for public-transport visualisation
text:
Additional Network Rail Data



Product
Note
Owner
Licence




Daily Footfall
Count in and out of the concourse area of Network Rail managed rail stations as CSV.
Network Rail
Open (OGL3)


SRAM Passenger Flow
Strategic Rail Analysis Model (SRAM)for Great Britain uses infrastructure, timetable and public transport schedules to model rail passenger. See Passenger Load documentation.
Network Rail
Open (OGL3)


Track Gradient
R&D Track Gradient uses LiDAR to automatically generate track-level gradient data.
Network Rail
Open (OGL3)


Workforce Headcount
Network Rail headcount by functions for each period of the financial year.
Network Rail
Open (OGL3)
